sentences: In 1998, Koglin had success with the single "The Silence", a remake of Depeche Mode's "Enjoy the Silence", which reached number 20 on the UK Singles Chart.
His song "When Will You Learn", written and produced for Boy George, received a Grammy nomination for Best Dance Recording in 1998.
Koglin runs his own music label Noys Music, launched in 2004.
In 2016, he launched a second label named Yomo Records for progressive and techno releases.
Having lived in London from 1990 to 2012, Koglin now lives and works in Berlin, Germany.
Sunny Lax & Solex - "Out of This World" (2010)
